fields.description: To track item in sales and purchase documents based on their serial nos. This is can also used to track warranty details of the product.
fields.label: Item Serial Nos

fields.description:
To track items in sales and purchase documents with batch nos
Preferred Industry: Chemicals etc
fields.label: Item Batch Nos

fields.description: To track brand name in the following documents Delivery Note, Opportunity, Material Request, Item, Purchase Order, Purchase Voucher, Purchaser Receipt, Quotation, Sales Invoice, Sales BOM, Sales Order, Serial No
fields.label: Brands

fields.description: To track items using barcode. You will be able to enter items in Delivery Note and Sales Invoice by scanning barcode of item.
fields.label: Item Barcode

fields.description: 1. To maintain the customer wise item code and to make them searchable based on their code use this option
fields.label: Item Advanced

fields.description: To get Item Group in details table
fields.label: Item Groups in Details

fields.description: All export related fields like currency, conversion rate, export total, export grand total etc are available in Delivery Note, POS, Quotation, Sales Invoice, Sales Order etc.
fields.label: Exports

fields.description: All import related fields like currency, conversion rate, import total, import grand total etc are available in Purchase Receipt, Supplier Quotation, Purchase Invoice, Purchase Order etc.
fields.label: Imports

fields.description: Field available in Delivery Note, Quotation, Sales Invoice, Sales Order
fields.label: Sales Discounts

fields.description: Discount Fields will be available in Purchase Order, Purchase Receipt, Purchase Invoice
fields.label: Purchase Discounts

fields.description: To track any installation or commissioning related work after sales
fields.label: After Sale Installations

fields.description: Available in BOM, Delivery Note, Purchase Invoice, Production Order, Purchase Order, Purchase Receipt, Sales Invoice, Sales Order, Stock Entry, Timesheet
fields.label: Projects

fields.description: If you have Sales Team and Sale Partners (Channel Partners)  they can be tagged and maintain their contribution in the sales activity
fields.label: Sales Extras

fields.description: Check if you need automatic recurring invoices. After submitting any sales invoice, Recurring section will be visible.
fields.label: Recurring Invoice

fields.description: If you involve in manufacturing activity. Enables Item 'Is Manufactured'
fields.label: Manufacturing

fields.description: If you follow Quality Inspection. Enables Item QA Required and QA No in Purchase Receipt
fields.label: Quality

fields.description: If you have long print formats, this feature can be used to split the page to be printed on multiple pages with all headers and footers on each page
fields.label: Page Break
